Trade/Device Name(s): ImmunoCAP Allergen o215, Component nGal-alpha-1,3-Gal (alpha-Gal) Thyroglobulin, bovine
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ImmunoCAP Allergen o215, alpha-Gal, a fluorescent enzyme immunoassay for the measurement of allergen-specific IgE antibodies in human serum and EDTA plasma
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro diagnostic use, in human serum or EDTA plasma, as an aid in the diagnosis of IgE mediated mammalian meat hypersensitivity due to alpha-Gal sensitization, used in conjunction with other clinical findings
